item.title: Bariani
item.description:
Bariani
Bariani is a Olive Oil & products company that is family owned and operated. Bariani started the business before 1994 with the mission: Our family gives particular care to the entire extraction process from the tending of the orchard to the bottling of the oil, opting for quality rather than quantity.
Bariani helps sponsor road races in Zamora, has purchased land for possible future hosting of a Sacramento Velodrome, Cyclocross and running events.

item.title: Specialized
item.description:
Specialized
Specialized Bicycles, founded in Morgan Hill, CA in 1974, is a company filled with passionate cyclists who lead the industry with innovative bikes for all types of riding. Specialized is committed to global cycling advocacy and environmental consciousness.

item.title: Kenetic Cycles
item.description:
Kinetic Cycles
Why Kinetic? Kinetic Cycles is committed to sharing and spreading our passion for bicycles and the quality of life they offer. Check out Kinetic Cycle!

item.title: BikeDog Brewing Co
item.description:
Bike Dog Brewing Co
Bike Dog Brewing Company is co-founded by four Sacramentans with a love for bikes, dogs and craft beer.

item.title: Bullseye
item.description:
Bullseye Paintless Dent Removal, Inc.
Bullseye PDR is Sacramento's premier Mobile Paintless Dent Removal service provider.

item.title: US Certified Signers
item.description:
US Certified Signers
A premier nationwide notary loan document signing service that provides mobile certified notary signing agents and attorneys to title, escrow and the mortgage industry.

item.title: GU Enery
item.description:
GU Pure Performance Energy
From 1991 until today, athletes the world over have come to the same conclusion: GU works. Our Berkeley-based sports nutrition company started with our original GU Energy Gel, a revolutionary and more effective method to keep athletes fueled during exercise.

item.title: Mark W. Lai, DDS
item.description:
MARK W. LAI, DDS
Family Dentistry, Sacramento, CA.

item.title: SHAPE
item.description:
SHAPE
Roberto Quintana, professor of kinesiology and health science, and exercise science students operate the Site for Human Applied Physiology and Exercise, or SHAPE.

item.title: Voler
item.description:
Voler
Voler Team Apparel an official supplier to the Sacramento Golden Wheelmen Racing Team.

item.title: Wells Fargo
item.description:
WellsFargo
Wells Fargo & Company provides diversified financial services through more than 9,000 stores, 12,000 Wells Fargo and Wachovia ATMs, and the Internet across North America and internationally.

item.title: Williams Cycling
item.description:
Williams Cycling
At Williams Cycling, our mission is simple: to produce wheel systems that are of the highest quality and functionality. Importantly, we believe we can produce this product at an affordable price point that allows all levels of cyclists to experience the virtues of high performance wheel systems historically reserved for the elite / unlimited budget athlete. Williams is the bike wheel sponsor for the Sacramento Golden Wheelmen Racing Team.
